resources.string: You are not connected to a Zephyr HxM
No Zephyr HxM devices have been paired?
MESSAGE_STATE_CHANGE: message from HxM service indicating that the state of the service has been updated, and may have changed
HXM_SERVICE_MSG_READ: message from HxM service with data read from the device
HXM_SERVICE_MSG_DEVICE_NAME: message from HxM service indicating the name of the device that a connection is associated with
HXM_SERVICE_MSG_TOAST: message from HxM service requesting a toast be shown to the user
HXM_SERVICE_RESTING: HxM service is at rest
HXM_SERIVICE_CONNECTING: HxM service is trying to connect to an HxM
HXM_SERVICE_CONNECTED: HxM service is connected to a HxM
